name: Speedrunning Platformer
description:
Try and reach the goal at the top as fast as you can! Try and dodge the various obstacles scattered around the many levels in the game. 

There are currently 7 extremely-hard levels so far, and more will be added soon!

Controls: 

  • Arrow keys / WASD to move
  • R to reset
  • P to pause
  • T to return to the main menu (when playing)

This game was made in the Godot game engine.

All assets (art, sound effects, music, level layout and design, etc.) and code (excluding engine code) were made by me, JWhiz Games.

This game was a great learning experience as my first time using Godot. Enjoy!
